casebody.data:
David FELTON
v.
C.D. HARKLEROAD et al. No. 116P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 24, 2004. David Felton, Pro Se. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, for Harkleroad.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 8th day of March 2004 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, McDowell County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th day of June 2004."
